doc.title: Martor fara voie
doc.plot: Patrick is a young man hunted by dark visions which soon turn to reality; David is a police officer open to the idea that such premonitions may be true, while his partner George, a corrupt and violent policeman, is eager to pin the violent crimes on Patrick. Professor K supports David's idea that Patrick is an innocent man with an extraordinary ability to see into the future; while Tina is the girlfriend David tries to distance himself from, in order to protect her from the dark world he had started to be confronted with.
